âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Lightweight CLI and local API server for managing macOS and Linux VMs â€¢ Near-native performance on Apple Silicon using Apple's Virtualization.Framework â€¢ Create, run, manage, and delete VMs â€¢ Pull prebuilt macOS images â€¢ Share directories with VMs
ðŸ“– Summary: Lume is a command-line interface and API server that simplifies the creation, management, and execution of virtual machines on Apple Silicon. It leverages Apple's Virtualization.Framework for optimal performance and offers a range of commands for VM lifecycle management, configuration adjustments, and image handling. A Python interface is also provided for programmatic control.
